Reviews.Title: This phone is alright, but not worth $299.00
Reviews.Author: Juan "Juan"
Reviews.Content: $299.00 for this phone? LOL  How about $9.99 instead?I own one of these. It was nice hardware, but the operating system/firmware was very buggy. Any Sprint store will upgrade the firmware to make the phone useable, but expect it to still black out once in a while when you try to text, and then you have to type your message all over again. This is nice for a flip phone, but not a $300 phone.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: donna malveaux
Reviews.Content: The phone is pretty, but lots of time the other person cannot hear me, sometimes it rings and sometimes it don"t. It has a problem with charging I have brought to different charger and they still don"t connect tight. I called my sprint services and ask is there a problem with the sprint system and they said no.

Reviews.Title: sanyo catana eclipse
Reviews.Author: rey  uriostegui
Reviews.Content: these phone is ok i buy it used, still do phone call and text and take pictures, i work for me thanks
